Reminder that there are still a few homework packets/bags available for pickup in the entryway of door #2 at the school. Bags will have names of students on them. Continue to urge your students to participate with their online/distance learning and to communicate with staff. If there is anything the school can help with to fight through barriers, let us know! We are in this together!

Today @ 1:30pm is our Emerado Parade. We do not have a set route we will be taking, however the plan will be to go through where students are picked up and dropped off daily throughout the year. We will go through as many streets as possible from there. Hope to see all your smiling faces in town! Dress warm!
Tomorrow Thursday, April 9th @ 1:30 pm will be an Emerado Parade! Please meet us outside to wave and say hello! We look forward to seeing you all!
Homework and food bags are available for pick-up in the entryway of door #2 at the school. These doors will remain open after hours to accomodate for work schedules.
If you do not contact the school, and do not receive meals your students' school materials will be in the entryway of door #2 for pick-up. Your students' name will be on the bag of materials.
